long_description: The versatile 686 Smarty Echo waterproof and insulated 3-in-1 jacket for boys transforms into three different setups to keep young snow riders warm and dry in a wide range of conditions. Durable polyester shell offers weather protection with INFIDRY-8(TM) waterproof, breathable coating and taped critical seams. Non-bulky polyester insulation in shell jacket traps heat for cozy warmth all day long and insulates even when damp. Microfleece liner jacket can be worn alone on a mild day or zipped into the shell for excellent warmth in cold weather. Youth Evolution sleeves extend 1.5 in. to keep up with your child's growth for another season. Adjustable hood with reinforced brim; inner draft flap; soft chin guard; zippered hand pockets; chest pockets; adjustable powder skirt; rip-and-stick cuffs; drawcord hem.
